com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory
Class ConfigurationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException
              com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.ConfigurationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ConfigurationException
extends com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException

An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactoryImpl being initialized from a parameters provided by a configuration namespace if any error occurs while reading the configuration parameters, instantiating and initializing the ConnectionProducers. This exception can also be thrown from the two constructors in DBConnectionFactoryImpl class which accepts a ConfigurationObject parameter to initialize the factory. Usually this exception will wrap the original exception which caused the operation to fail. Such a cause may be obtained through BaseException.getCause() method.

Side Note : Empty String means the length of string after trimming equals to zero.

Thread Safety: this class is thread safe since it has no internal state and the base exception BaseException is thread safe.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
isv, qiucx0161, nhzp339, magicpig
